title: Is Prayer Your Last Priority?
itunes:author: Guest: Teri Lynne Underwood
itunes:summary:
Corrie ten Boom once asked, "Is prayer your steering wheel or your spare tire?" John and Danny describe key prayers to pray for your kids.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Praying for Girls" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-05-25?refcd=1097201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/is-prayer-your-last-priority/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
